output.sentences: Everyone was laughing and joking that Joe would one day marry Cindy.
Alfred and Eleanor were finally married, after many ups and downs.
Though they had a beat up vehicle and a small apartment, they were content because they had each other.
The wedding guests all signed the picture frame matt surrounding a photo of the two of them.
Though Jim was very much against the marriage, they did not let it ruin their day.
